

    def test_{{name}}(self):
        # TODO : Replace All Input {{http}}
        res = self.client().{{http|lower}}('{{rooUrl}}{{http_url}}', headers={'user': self.user},
        {%- if http.lower() != 'get' %} json={
        {%- for key, value in docstring.items() %}
            "{{key}}": "{{value}}"{%-if not loop.last -%}, {%- endif -%}
        {%- endfor %}
        }
        {%- else %} query_string={
        {%- for key, value in docstring.items() %}
            '{{key}}': '{{value}}'{%-if not loop.last -%}, {%- endif -%}
        {%- endfor %}
        }
        {%- endif %})
        data = json.loads(res.data)
        log.info('test_{{name}}: %s', data)
        self.assertEqual(res.status_code, 200)
